nodes.text: Braconnor Bakiska was a male Stennes Shifter who was present in Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina when the Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi and the former moisture farmer Luke Skywalker entered. He sat with fellow patrons Bom Vimdin, Pons Limbic, Hem Dazon and Arleil Schous.

Shortly before the Battle of Yavin, the male Stennes Shifter Braconnor Bakiska spent a period of time in Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina on the planet Tatooine. While in the cantina, he sat at a table close to the entrance with several other patrons: the Arcona Hem Dazon, the Advozse Bom Vimdin, the Defel Arleil Schous and the Siniteen Pons Limbic. While the group sat together, a pair of humans—the Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi and the former moisture farmer Luke Skywalker—entered the establishment looking for a pilot to take them to the planet Alderaan.
Bakiska had tan skin and brown hair, including a moustache. Like many members of his species, he was hyper-wary of strangers.
